mapper.select: SELECT C.CARTNO,C.MEMBERNO,C.BOOKNO,C.CCOUNT, B.BTITLE,B.BPRICESELL,B.BDISCOUNT,B.BPRICE, D.BIMG,CT.BCATEGORY1, M.MEMBERNO FROM M_CART C, M_BOOK B, M_BOOK_DETAIL D, M_BOOK_BCATEGORY CT, M_MEMBER M WHERE C.BOOKNO=B.BOOKNO AND C.BOOKNO=D.BOOKNO AND D.BCATEGORYNO=CT.BCATEGORYNO AND C.MEMBERNO=M.MEMBERNO AND C.MEMBERNO = 1
SELECT COUNT(CARTNO) FROM M_CART WHERE MEMBERNO=1
SELECT SUM(CCOUNT) FROM M_CART WHERE MEMBERNO=1
mapper.update: UPDATE M_CART SET CCOUNT=#{param1} WHERE MEMBERNO=1 AND CARTNO=#{param2}
